Episodes.Title: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Caitlin Schneiderhan
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: Still reeling from the events last year, the gang tries to move on with their lives. However, a threat is brewing both on Earth and the Upside Down.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Two: Vecna's Curse
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Caitlin Schneiderhan
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: A plane brings Mike to California -- and a dead body brings Hawkins to a halt. Nancy goes looking for leads. A shaken Eddie tells the gang what he saw.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Three: The Monster and the Superhero
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Caitlin Schneiderhan
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: Murray and Joyce fly to Alaska, and El faces serious consequences. Robin and Nancy dig up dirt on Hawkins' demons. Dr. Owens delivers sobering news.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Four: Dear Billy
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: Max is in grave danger - and running out of time. A patient at Pennhurst Asylum has visitors. Elsewhere, in Russia, Hopper is hard at work.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Five: The Nina Project
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Kate Trefry
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: Owens takes El to Nevada, where she's forced to confront her past, while the Hawkins kids comb a crumbling house for clues. Vecna claims another victim.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Six: The Dive
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Curtis Gwinn
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: Behind the Iron Curtain, a risky rescue mission gets underway. The California crew seeks help from a hacker. Steve takes one for the team.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Seven: The Massacre at Hawkins Lab
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Caitlin Schneiderhan
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: As Hopper braces to battle a monster, Dustin dissects Vecna's motives -- and decodes a message from beyond. El finds strength in a distant memory.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Eight: Papa
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Caitlin Schneiderhan
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: Nancy has sobering visions, and El passes an important test. Back in Hawkins, the gang gathers supplies and prepares for battle.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Nine: The Piggyback
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Caitlin Schneiderhan
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
Episodes.Plot: With selfless hearts and a clash of metal, heroes fight from every corner of the battlefield to save Hawkins - and the world itself.
